fields.name: Restricted Words
fields.value:
Messages containing Discord invite links, certain restricted words and characters, and spam will automatically be deleted by <@!134133271750639616>.
** **
Posts containing these phrases will result in a warning in <#227643567273672706>.
[List of restricted words](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/discordlinux/rules/master/censored.txt)
​

fields.name: Verbal Warning
fields.value:
A staff member asks the user to stop.
​

fields.name: Written Warning
fields.value:
A staff member issues a warning to <#227643567273672706>.
When the user reaches 8 warnings, they will be muted for 1 hour and have their Users role revoked automatically.​

fields.name: Temporary Mute
fields.value:
A staff member temporarily mutes the user.
​

fields.name: Temporary Ban/Permanent Ban
fields.value:
A staff member bans the user from the server either temporarily or permanently.
​

fields.name: Please note:
fields.value:
Staff members will determine the proper punishment based on the infraction.
Warnings, mutes, and bans are logged to <#227643567273672706> for everyone to view.
